sense.def:
Z izrazom
wherever
povemo, da je nekaj res ali se zgodi v kateremkoli kraju ali okoliščinah.

seg.quote: Wherever he was, he was happy.
They have tried to restore the house wherever possible to its original state.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
wherever
tudi povemo, da ne vemo, kje je določeni kraj ali oseba.

seg.quote: ‘Where does she live?’—‘Alten, wherever that is.’
